title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Analysis of Micro-Credentialing Policies and Implementation Practices

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can quantitatively analyze the current status of micro-credentialing policies in universities across the Middle East and North Africa.
Learners can explain at least three core elements of micro-credential design standards (learning design, assessment, issuance, etc.).
Learners can propose organizational micro-credential adoption strategies based on survey results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
